detaileddescription.para: Component type, either a button or action row
Sub components, buttons on an action row
Component label (for buttons, text inputs). Maximum of 80 characters.

briefdescription.para: Text style (for text inputs)

detaileddescription.para: Component id (for buttons, menus, text inputs). Maximum of 100 characters.
URL for link types (dpp::cos_link). Maximum of 512 characters.
Placeholder text for select menus and text inputs (max 150 characters)
Minimum number of selectable values for a select menu. -1 to not set this
Maximum number of selectable values for a select menu. -1 to not set this.
Whether the text input is required to be filled
Value of the modal (filled or valid when populated from an on_form_submit event, or from the set_value function)

briefdescription.para: Set the type of the component. Button components (type dpp::cot_button) should always be contained within an action row (type dpp::cot_action_row). As described below, many of the other methods automatically set this to the correct type so usually you should not need to manually call component::set_type().

parameterdescription.para: The component type

briefdescription.para: Set the text style of a text component.

parameterdescription.para: Text style type to set

briefdescription.para: Set the label of the component, e.g. button text. For action rows, this field is ignored. Setting the label will auto-set the type to dpp::cot_button.

parameterdescription.para: Label text to set. It will be truncated to the maximum length of 80 UTF-8 characters.

briefdescription.para: Set the default value of the text input component. For action rows, this field is ignored. Setting the value will auto-set the type to dpp::cot_text.

parameterdescription.para: Value text to set. It will be truncated to the maximum length of 4000 UTF-8 characters.

briefdescription.para: Set the url for dpp::cos_link types. Calling this function sets the style to dpp::cos_link and the type to dpp::cot_button.

parameterdescription.para: URL to set. It will be truncated to the maximum length of 512 UTF-8 characters.

briefdescription.para: Set the style of the component, e.g. button colour. For action rows, this field is ignored. Setting the style will auto-set the type to dpp::cot_button.

parameterdescription.para: Component style to set

briefdescription.para: Set the id of the component. For action rows, this field is ignored. Setting the id will auto-set the type to dpp::cot_button.

parameterdescription.para: Custom ID string to set. This ID will be sent for any on_button_click events related to the button.

simplesect.para: The maximum length of the Custom ID is 100 UTF-8 codepoints. If your Custom ID is longer than this, it will be truncated.

briefdescription.para: Set the component to disabled. Defaults to false on all created components.

parameterdescription.para: True to disable, false to disable.

briefdescription.para: Set if this component is required. Defaults to false on all created components.

parameterdescription.para: True to require this, false to make it optional.

briefdescription.para: Set the placeholder.

parameterdescription.para: placeholder string. It will be truncated to the maximum length of 150 UTF-8 characters for select menus, and 100 UTF-8 characters for modals.

briefdescription.para: Set the min value.

parameterdescription.para: min value to set

briefdescription.para: Set the max value.

parameterdescription.para: max value to set

briefdescription.para: Set the min length of text input.

parameterdescription.para: min value to set

briefdescription.para: Set the max length of text input.

parameterdescription.para: max value to set

briefdescription.para: Add a select option.

parameterdescription.para: option to add

briefdescription.para: Add a sub-component, only valid for action rows. Adding subcomponents to a component will automatically set this component's type to dpp::cot_action_row.

parameterdescription.para: The sub-component to add

briefdescription.para: Set the emoji of the current sub-component. Only valid for buttons. Adding an emoji to a component will automatically set this components type to dpp::cot_button. One or both of name and id must be set. For a built in unicode emoji, you only need set name, and should set it to a unicode character e.g. "ðŸ˜„". For custom emojis, set the name to the name of the emoji on the guild, and the id to the emoji's ID. Setting the animated boolean is only valid for custom emojis.

parameterdescription.para: Emoji name, or unicode character to use
Emoji id, for custom emojis only.
True if the custom emoji is animated.

detaileddescription.para:
Read class values from json object
j
A json object to read from
A reference to self

briefdescription.para: Build JSON string from the object.

parameterdescription.para: Include the ID in the JSON

simplesect.para: std::string JSON string version of object

briefdescription.para: Represents the component object. A component is a clickable button or drop down list within a discord message, where the buttons emit on_button_click events when the user interacts with them.

detaileddescription.para: You should generally define one component object and then insert one or more additional components into it using component::add_component(), so that the parent object is an action row and the child objects are buttons.

simplesect.para: At present this only works for whitelisted guilds. The beta is closed. When this feature is released, then the functionality will work correctly.
